completedItems.title: chore: make cleanup script compatible across platforms
completedItems.body:

Hey!

completedItems.title: fix client scroll bars

Now it is much cleaner and fullscreen no scrolls.

completedItems.title: Enhance message handling and text escaping by adding null checks.
completedItems.body:
Enhance message handling and text escaping by adding null checks. 
Updated MessageManager to handle empty messages and modified utility functions to return empty strings for null inputs, ensuring robustness in message processing.

This PR fixes all red errors in plugin-bootstrap and generates a index.d.ts.
